projects.title: ATM Cash Flow Optimization for Barclays
projects.description: Developed predictive cash flow model using machine learning to optimize ATM cash replenishment. The system used XGBoost to forecast cash demand with 90% accuracy and integrated with Power BI dashboards for real-time monitoring.
projects.results: 25% reduction in ATM cash shortages, 15% less cash held in low-traffic ATMs, 20% lower cash delivery costs, improved customer experience

projects.title: Customer Retention Solution for Beagle Street Insurance
projects.description: Built customer churn prediction model and Tableau dashboard to improve policy renewals. Used predictive analytics to identify at-risk customers and recommended targeted retention strategies.
projects.results: 10-15% increase in policy renewals, improved customer retention rates

projects.title: Sales and Inventory Optimization for Greendale Organics
projects.description: Implemented sales and inventory analysis system for organic grocery chain. Built Power BI dashboards and used Python for demand forecasting to optimize stock levels and reduce waste.
projects.results: 18% reduction in perishable stock waste, 15% improvement in stock availability of high-demand products

projects.title: Automated Loan Pre-Screening System for JPMorgan Chase
projects.description: Developed AI-powered loan pre-screening system using machine learning to automatically filter weak applications. Integrated with Google Cloud AI for real-time processing and Power BI for monitoring.
projects.results: 40% faster loan approvals, 35% reduction in manual workload, improved operational efficiency

projects.title: Data Pipeline Implementation for Social Media Analytics
projects.description: Built automated data pipeline for social media analytics agency. Used Python and Apache Airflow to extract data from multiple social media APIs, transform it, and load into AWS Redshift for analysis.
projects.results: Automated data extraction and reporting process, enabled real-time campaign performance insights

projects.title: COVID-19 Impact Tracking for Non-COVID Patients
projects.description: Developed hospital data analytics system to track COVID-19 impact on non-COVID patients. Used AWS cloud platforms, Tableau dashboards, and predictive modeling with SageMaker.
projects.results: Improved resource allocation, identified high-risk patients, enhanced hospital decision-making

projects.title: Predicting 30-Day Readmission in Diabetic Patients
projects.description: Developed supervised learning model to predict diabetic patient readmissions within 30 days. Used data mining techniques and focused on F1-score optimization for the positive class.
projects.results: Predictive model for hospital readmissions, improved patient care planning

projects.title: EEG-based ADHD Diagnosis using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed end-to-end deep learning model for automated ADHD diagnosis using EEG signals. Used CNN with CWT transformations and implemented explainable AI with Grad-CAM.
projects.results: Automated ADHD diagnosis system with explainable AI components

projects.title: Pepsi-Cola Marketing Mix Analysis
projects.description: Comprehensive marketing analytics project analyzing Pepsi's sales drivers. Used regression modeling, adstock specifications, and machine learning techniques for sales prediction.
projects.results: Marketing mix optimization insights, sales prediction models

projects.title: Cryptocurrency Time Series Analytics
projects.description: Built system to fetch and analyze 100+ time series metrics from Glassnode API for multiple cryptocurrencies. Structured data into pandas DataFrames with efficient API handling.
projects.results: Automated cryptocurrency data pipeline, structured analytics framework

projects.title: Traffic Regulations Impact Research
projects.description: Research analysis on traffic regulations and infrastructure impact on accidents. Used data science techniques to analyze relationships between infrastructure, regulations, and safety.
projects.results: Policy recommendations, traffic safety insights

projects.title: Business Operations Data Modeling
projects.description: Developed comprehensive data model with 14 calculated measures and columns for business operations tracking. Created measures for agreement expense, contract duration, margin analysis.
projects.results: Automated business metrics calculation, improved operational visibility

projects.title: Sales Dashboard Development
projects.description: Created management dashboard for sales data analysis. Included key metrics like customer sales, gross profit, shipping costs, and negative profit items across multiple dimensions.
projects.results: Comprehensive sales dashboard, improved management visibility

projects.title: Google Sheets Data Automation
projects.description: Built automated data transfer system between Google Sheets tabs. Created daily and weekly automated tables for deal tracking and response management.
projects.results: Automated data workflow, reduced manual data entry

projects.title: Plant Database Interactive Interface
projects.description: Designed interactive database interface for plant/factory infrastructure data. Created overview dashboard with filtering capabilities across 8 franchises and multiple plants.
projects.results: Interactive plant database, improved data accessibility

projects.title: Billing Process Tracking Dashboard
projects.description: Developed professional interactive dashboard to track billing process completion rates. Included detailed progress tracking for multiple clients with phase-wise categorization.
projects.results: Real-time billing process tracking, improved project management

projects.title: Student Graduation Readiness System
projects.description: Designed student information system solution for graduation readiness tracking. Consolidated data on credits, courses, GPA, and risk indicators into user-friendly application.
projects.results: Integrated student progress tracking, improved graduation planning

projects.title: Regional Performance Dashboard
projects.description: Created regional performance dashboard with 4 KPIs for 7 regions with multiple districts. Included filtering capabilities and monthly update functionality.
projects.results: Regional performance monitoring system, data-driven decision support

projects.title: Gaming Reduction Planner Redesign
projects.description: Redesigned gaming tracking and reduction planning sheets. Improved UI/UX, removed clutter, added visualization graphs, and enhanced professional appearance.
projects.results: Professional client-facing tools, improved user experience

projects.title: Tableau Analytics Dashboard Suite
projects.description: Developed comprehensive Tableau dashboard suite with 8 visualizations including funnel charts, stacked bars, pie charts, and line charts for user behavior analysis.
projects.results: Complete analytics dashboard suite, user behavior insights

projects.title: GNSS Earthquake Data Analytics
projects.description: Analyzed GNSS data with seismic records to identify earthquake patterns. Used statistical analysis, correlation studies, and mutual information for predictive insights.
projects.results: Earthquake pattern insights, GNSS-seismic correlation analysis

projects.title: Chicago Taxi Data Analysis
projects.description: Comprehensive analysis of Chicago taxi trip data. Performed data cleaning, feature engineering, and ARIMA forecasting for fare predictions and operational optimization.
projects.results: Operational optimization insights, fare forecasting models

projects.title: Retail Store Decision Support System
projects.description: Designed comprehensive Decision Support System for retail business using Power BI. Included data integration, analytical tools, and user-friendly interface for strategic decision-making.

projects.title: Traffic Accident Analysis in R
projects.description: R programming analysis of traffic accident dataset. Investigated causes, distributions, and relationships between various factors affecting accident severity.
projects.results: Traffic safety insights, accident causation analysis

projects.title: ERP Data Analysis for Council Decision Making
projects.description: Comprehensive ERP data analysis project using CRISP-DM methodology. Developed visualization tools and management reports for organizational decision support.

projects.title: Power BI Sales Dashboard Suite
projects.description: Comprehensive Power BI dashboard with interactive visualizations for sales, profit, discount, and geographical analysis. Included drill-through capabilities and dynamic filtering.

projects.title: E-commerce Database Design
projects.description: Designed relational database for web-based retailer. Included order processing, inventory monitoring, customer management, and analytical capabilities.
projects.results: Scalable e-commerce database, improved operational efficiency

projects.title: Spatial Data Science Geostatistics
projects.description: Geostatistics analysis using ArcGIS Pro and R. Implemented spatial measures of central tendency and dispersion for point event analysis.
projects.results: Spatial pattern analysis, geostatistical insights

projects.title: Retail Sales Data Science Analysis
projects.description: Data science analysis for retail chain optimization. Applied statistical techniques including descriptive stats, correlation analysis, hypothesis testing, and time-series analysis.
projects.results: Retail optimization strategies, data-driven decision insights

projects.title: London Housing Data Analysis
projects.description: Python analysis of London housing data. Covered data manipulation, visualization with Seaborn/Matplotlib, and practical data analysis techniques.

projects.title: India Census 2011 Data Analysis
projects.description: Analysis of India Census 2011 data using Python Pandas. Focused on demographic analysis, data manipulation techniques, and hands-on data exploration.
projects.results: Demographic insights, census data analysis framework

projects.title: Police Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Python analysis of police traffic stop data. Included data cleaning, filtering, grouping, and statistical analysis of traffic stop patterns.
projects.results: Traffic stop pattern insights, data analysis framework

projects.title: Car Dataset Market Analysis
projects.description: Automotive market analysis using car dataset. Performed data cleaning, exploration of car makes, regional analysis, and outlier removal.

projects.title: Weather Data Analysis
projects.description: Practical data analysis project using weather dataset. Covered fundamental data analysis commands, descriptive statistics, and data filtering techniques.

projects.description: Comprehensive analysis of Netflix dataset. Included data cleaning, duplicate removal, null value handling, and answering various business questions.

projects.description: Comparative analysis of SARIMA implementation in R and Python. Focused on time series forecasting results and methodological comparisons.
